Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface View

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyViewGUI, LocalView, RemoteView, ViewBot, ViewCLI
    public interface View
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface that represents the methods of the view.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void disconnect()
      Signal the disconnection of the view.
      void notifyEndMatch​(java.util.ArrayList<StandingsItem> standings)
      Notify the end of a game and send the standings.
      void ping()
      No-op method used to establish if connection is still up.

      Select a square from a list of squares.

    • Method Detail

      • selectObject

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectObject​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> objUuid,
                                                   int min,
                                                   int max,
                                                   Dialog dialog)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Select a square from a list of squares.
        Parameters:
        objUuid - List of the UUID of the objects.
        min - Minimum number of objects to be chosen.
        max - Maximum number of objects to be chosen.
        dialog - The dialog to be shown
        Returns:
        List of selected objects.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If there is a network error.

        Parameters:

        Notify the end of a game and send the standings.
        Parameters:
